title: The Ex-Janitor Who Was Expelled, Became Known As The "greatest Repairman" With His Exceptional Skills - Requests From Sss Rank Parties And Royalty Don't Stop Coming
alternative_title: The ex-janitor who was expelled, became known as the "greatest repairman" with his exceptional skills - Requests from SSS rank parties and royalty don't stop coming
status: The ex-janitor who was expelled, became known as the "greatest repairman" with his exceptional skills - Requests from SSS rank parties and royalty don't stop coming
description:
Description :
        Lyle has no combat skills, only his role as a "repairer". He is treated as incompetent in the party he belongs to, and the leader of the party banishes him from the party. Lyle is at his wit's end when a swordsman appears before him, asking him to repair an old sword...?
